tutorials.title: How to Convert Time to Seconds using Excel

code.html: 00:01 * 86400 = 60
15:00 * 86400 = 54000
0.625 * 86400 = 54000

code.text: 24 (hours) * 60 (minutes) * 60 (seconds) = 86400
code.html: 24 (hours) * 60 (minutes) * 60 (seconds) = 86400

tutorials.title: How to Find the Difference Between Two Times Using Excel

code.text: Time Seconds Conversion number 86400 Time A 14:00 Minutes 60 Time B 16:00 Hours 60 Time between Seconds Minutes Hours

code.html: B2(14:00) * G1(86400) = 50400
C3(57600) - C2(50400) = 7200 Seconds
F9(7200) / G2(60) = 120 Minutes
F9(120) / G3(60) = 2 Hours
